heading: Peacekeeping forces.
general-note: Here are entered works on military forces that conduct operations with the consent of all major parties to a dispute, designed to monitor and facilitate implementation of an agreement and support diplomatic efforts to reach a long-term political settlement..

This heading may be divided geographically by names of regions or countries where these forces operate. Works on the participation in, or provision of, peacekeeping forces by a specific region or country are entered under. Peacekeeping forces. qualified by region or nationality, e.g.,. Peacekeeping forces, Australian,. with further subdivision by place, if any, in which the forces operate..
